body:
Comment 5 by **dowobeha**: 
Here is the primary use case where I have found myself wanting nested comments:

/*
 * Here's a multiline comment,
 * that documents the functionality
 * of a function, method, class, etc.
 */
function foo(bar b) {
 ....
}


In such cases, I'm unable to conveniently comment out large sections of the code
using a multi-line comment, because of the use of multi-line comments as documentation.
